name: NCBI
description:
This is a root domain proxy. You can try replacing any link starting with https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/ with https://ncbi.leemina.moe/ to access it. You can also visit the NCBI main site directly by visiting this link.
 --------------- 
这是一个根域名代理，您可以尝试将任何以 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/ 开头的链接替换为 https://ncbi.leemina.moe/ 尝试访问，您也可以直接访问该链接以访问 NCBI 主站

name: BLAST
description:
Note: Some links on this page may not be accessible through a proxy. If you need a specific BLAST service, please refer to the following content on this page. If the service is not reverse-proxied, please us and we will add it as soon as possible.
---------------
注意：页面内的部分链接可能无法通过代理访问，如果需要特定的 BLAST 服务，请参阅网页后续内容，若该服务没有被反向代理，请向网站管理员发送邮件，管理员会尽快添加
